```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

women_data <- read_csv("data/women_in_gov.csv", skip = 4)


```
```{r}
names(women_data)
```

```{r}

unique(women_data$x64)
unique(women_data$indicator_name) 
unique(women_data$indicator_code)
unique(women_data$x1960)

women_data_clean <- women_data %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-c(
    #x64, indicator_name, indicator_code, 
    1960, 1961, x1962, x1963, x1964, x1965, x1966, x1967, x1968, x1969, x1970, x1980, x1981, x1982, x1983, x1984, x1985, x1986, x1987, x1988, x1989)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    x1960:hr_pm,
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "value",
  )
```
